Text: When I launch Single-Play, It asks for the CD ROM. I have the f***ing CD in the drive. I don't have damian tools installed or anything. How am I supposed to use the "NO CD Patch?"
Copy the "CoDSP.exe" file to "C:\Program Files\Call Of Duty" and replace the original file with the crack.

But how can I do that? The installation process starts up a whole new window which I can't escape from to mount the second...I've been mounting both of them at the same time until now. I think I'm missing something...can you help?
Raddaya: Press "Alt+Tab" to go to the desktop, or use the "Windows" key to get to the desktop, then mount the second disc in the same virtual drive.
